title: Rear Bevel Box Oil Level Check

body.body: Rear Bevel Box Oil Level Check
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Have an assistant stand the motorcycle upright.
Clean the area around the filler then remove the filler level plug. Discard the washer.

body.name: Final drive oil level check B00113

body.body: Fill with 75W/90 fully synthetic hypoid oil that meets specification API Service Level GL5, such as Castrol SAF-XO fully synthetic hypoid oil, until the level of oil inside the unit is level with the bottom of the filler.
